text:
Q: Dividing two columns in tableau A:

@Asfand

  1. Create a calculated field (image for ref attached)

Goto -> Analysis -> Calculated field or click on down arrow (indicated) -> create calculated field.

  1. Type COUNT([In-Scope Programs])/COUNT([Out of Scope Programs])

  2. Rename the calculation to In/out Scope programs or whatever you prefer.

  3. Hit ok, that'll save the calc under measures.

  4. Right-click the calculation: Default Properties -> number format -> Percentage.

  5. Drag the calculation onto the text card.

Q: Playing m3u8 files on jwplayer without rtmp A:

M3U8 does not run in Flash mode in JW5. You would need JW6 for this. Here is some more information - http://www.longtailvideo.com/support/jw-player/28856/using-apple-hls-streaming, if you would like a trial of us, please contact us - http://www.jwplayer.com/contact-us/

Q: Aspx C# MySQL connection string not connecting using web.Config A:

You can use old version of the MySQL dll for .Net, it's solve the problem.

Q: How to Parameterize the values in ajax TruClient scripts A:

Generate a random number in runtime and put that variable in the Ord= parameter. E.g.

a = Rand(1,100)
lr_save_param("{myrandval}",a);
Web_custome_request("",
"",
"",
"Ord={myrandval}",
LAST);

Q: How to consume PHP SOAP web service? A:

Using the WSDL from http://api.suaytur.net/API/API.asmx?WSDL, you could generate the corresponding package from wsdltophp.com in order to be sure on how to structure your request in PHP as every element will be a PHP object with setters/getters. It uses the native PHP SoapClient class so you'll understand easily and quickly who to send these requests if you're familiar with PHP
